chapter.name: Make a model view patcher

setdocpatch.name: How to make a view patcher

chapter.illustration: Setting bounded model on the fly
chapter.p: This tutorial goes through the basics of making a GUI view for your model. This explains how j.view can be used to bind to a particular node in your patcher namespace and how to communicate with your model's parameters.

seealsolist.seealso: Declare patcher as a model view
